trans-unit.source: lookup(map, key, [default]) - Performs a dynamic lookup into a map variable. The map parameter should be another variable, such as var.amis. If key does not exist in map, the interpolation will fail unless you specify a third argument, default, which should be a string value to return if no key is found in map. This function only works on flat maps and will return an error for maps that include nested lists or maps.
trans-unit.target: lookup(map, key, [default]) -对地图变量执行动态查找。所述 map 参数应该是另一变量，如 var.amis 。如果 map 中不存在 key ，则插值将失败，除非您指定第三个参数 default ，如果在 map 中未找到 key ，则该参数应为要返回的字符串值。此功能仅适用于平面地图，并且对于包含嵌套列表或地图的地图将返回错误。

trans-unit.source: matchkeys(values, keys, searchset) - For two lists values and keys of equal length, returns all elements from values where the corresponding element from keys exists in the searchset list. E.g. matchkeys(aws_instance.example.*.id, aws_instance.example.*.availability_zone, list("us-west-2a")) will return a list of the instance IDs of the aws_instance.example instances in "us-west-2a". No match will result in empty list. Items of keys are processed sequentially, so the order of returned values is preserved.
trans-unit.target: matchkeys(values, keys, searchset) -对于两个长度相等的 values 和 keys 列表，返回 values 中的所有元素，其中 keys 中的对应元素存在于 searchset 列表中。例如 matchkeys(aws_instance.example.*.id, aws_instance.example.*.availability_zone, list("us-west-2a")) 将返回 aws_instance.example 实例ID在 "us-west-2a" 。没有匹配项将导致列表为空。件 keys 是按顺序处理，所以返回的顺序 values 被保留。

trans-unit.source: max_connections - (Optional) The max number of simultaneous connections for the group. Can be used with either CONNECTION or UTILIZATION balancing modes. For CONNECTION mode, either maxConnections or maxConnectionsPerInstance must be set.
trans-unit.target: max_connections -（可选）组的最大同时连接数。可以与CONNECTION或UTILIZATION平衡模式一起使用。对于CONNECTION模式，必须设置maxConnections或maxConnectionsPerInstance。

trans-unit.source: max_connections_per_instance - (Optional) The max number of simultaneous connections that a single backend instance can handle. This is used to calculate the capacity of the group. Can be used in either CONNECTION or UTILIZATION balancing modes. For CONNECTION mode, either maxConnections or maxConnectionsPerInstance must be set.
trans-unit.target: max_connections_per_instance -（可选）单个后端实例可以处理的最大同时连接数。这用于计算组的容量。可以在CONNECTION或UTILIZATION平衡模式下使用。对于CONNECTION模式，必须设置maxConnections或maxConnectionsPerInstance。

trans-unit.source: max_count - (Optional) The maximum number of application versions to retain.
trans-unit.target: max_count -（可选）要保留的最大应用程序版本数。

trans-unit.source: max_delivery_count - (Required) The maximum number of deliveries.
trans-unit.target: max_delivery_count -（必需）最大交付数。

trans-unit.source: max_errors - (Required) The maximum number of errors allowed before this task stops being scheduled.
trans-unit.target: max_errors -（必需）在停止计划此任务之前允许的最大错误数。

trans-unit.source: max_failure_ratio - (Optional, string) The failure rate to tolerate during an update as float. Important: the floatneed to be wrapped in a string to avoid internal casting and precision errors.
trans-unit.target: max_failure_ratio -（可选，字符串）在更新过程中允许的失败率是 float 。重要提示：在 float 需要被包裹在一个 string ，以避免内部铸造，精度误差。

trans-unit.source: max_frame_rate - If you specify auto for FrameRate, Elastic Transcoder uses the frame rate of the input video for the frame rate of the output video, up to the maximum frame rate. If you do not specify a MaxFrameRate, Elastic Transcoder will use a default of 30.
trans-unit.target: max_frame_rate -如果为FrameRate指定auto，Elastic Transcoder将输入视频的帧速率用作输出视频的帧速率，直到最大帧速率。如果您未指定MaxFrameRate，则Elastic Transcoder将使用默认值30。

trans-unit.source: max_heap_size - (Optional) Maximum Java heap size for a Managed Server JVM, specified in megabytes.
trans-unit.target: max_heap_size -（可选）受管服务器JVM的最大Java堆大小，以兆字节为单位。

trans-unit.source: max_height - The maximum height of thumbnails, in pixels. If you specify auto, Elastic Transcoder uses 1080 (Full HD) as the default value. If you specify a numeric value, enter an even integer between 32 and 3072, inclusive.
trans-unit.target: max_height -缩略图的最大高度，以像素为单位。如果指定自动，则Elastic Transcoder使用1080（全高清）作为默认值。如果指定数字值，请输入32到3072之间的偶数整数（含）。

trans-unit.source: max_height - The maximum height of the output video in pixels. If you specify auto, Elastic Transcoder uses 1080 (Full HD) as the default value. If you specify a numeric value, enter an even integer between 96 and 3072, inclusive.

trans-unit.source: max_interval_in_seconds - (Optional) When used with the Bounded Staleness consistency level, this value represents the time amount of staleness (in seconds) tolerated. Accepted range for this value is 5 - 86400 (1 day). Defaults to 5. Required when consistency_level is set to BoundedStaleness.
trans-unit.target: max_interval_in_seconds -（可选）与“有界陈旧性”一致性级别一起使用时，此值表示可忍受的陈旧性时间（以秒为单位）。接受范围为这个值是 5 - 86400 （1天）。默认为 5 。当 consistency_level 设置为 BoundedStaleness 时是必需的。

trans-unit.source: max_interval_in_seconds - The amount of staleness (in seconds) tolerated when the consistency level is Bounded Staleness.
trans-unit.target: max_interval_in_seconds -一致性级别为“有界失效”时，允许的失效程度（以秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: max_lease_ttl_seconds - (Optional) The maximum TTL that can be requested for credentials issued by this backend.

trans-unit.source: max_lease_ttl_seconds - (Optional) Used as the duration for the intermediate Vault token Terraform issues itself, which in turn limits the duration of secret leases issued by Vault. Defaults to 20 minutes and may be set via the TERRAFORM_VAULT_MAX_TTL environment variable. See the section above on Using Vault credentials in Terraform configuration for the implications of this setting.
trans-unit.target: max_lease_ttl_seconds -（可选）用作中间保管库令牌Terraform发行本身的持续时间，从而限制了保管库发布的秘密租约的持续时间。默认为20分钟，可以通过 TERRAFORM_VAULT_MAX_TTL 环境变量进行设置。有关此设置的含义，请参见上面有关在Terraform配置中使用Vault凭据的部分。

trans-unit.source: max_length (Optional) - The maximum length of an attribute value of the string type.
trans-unit.target: max_length （可选）-字符串类型的属性值的最大长度。

trans-unit.source: max_limit_request_ratio - (Optional) The named resource must have a request and limit that are both non-zero where limit divided by request is less than or equal to the enumerated value; this represents the max burst for the named resource.
trans-unit.target: max_limit_request_ratio -（可选）命名资源必须具有一个非零的请求和限制，其中限制除以请求的限制小于或等于枚举值；这表示命名资源的最大突发数。

trans-unit.source: max_message_size - (Optional) The limit of how many bytes a message can contain before Amazon SQS rejects it. An integer from 1024 bytes (1 KiB) up to 262144 bytes (256 KiB). The default for this attribute is 262144 (256 KiB).
trans-unit.target: max_message_size -（可选）Amazon SQS拒绝消息之前消息可以包含多少字节的限制。从1024字节（1 KiB）到262144字节（256 KiB）的整数。该属性的默认值为262144（256 KiB）。

trans-unit.source: max_number_of_record_sets - (Optional) Maximum number of Records in the zone. Defaults to 1000.
trans-unit.target: max_number_of_record_sets -（可选）区域中的最大记录数。默认为 1000 。

trans-unit.source: max_padding_bytes - (Optional) The maximum amount of padding to apply. This is useful if you intend to copy the data from Amazon S3 to HDFS before querying. The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: max_padding_bytes -（可选）要应用的最大填充量。如果您打算在查询之前将数据从Amazon S3复制到HDFS，这将很有用。默认值为 0 。

trans-unit.source: max_password_age - (Optional) The number of days that an user password is valid.

trans-unit.source: max_prefixlen - (Optional) The maximum prefix size that can be allocated from the subnetpool. For IPv4 subnetpools, default is 32. For IPv6 subnetpools, default is 128. Changing this updates the max prefixlen of the existing subnetpool.
trans-unit.target: max_prefixlen -（可选）可以从子网池分配的最大前缀大小。对于IPv4子网池，默认值为32。对于IPv6子网池，默认值为128。更改此选项将更新现有子网池的max prefixlen。

trans-unit.source: max_prefixlen - (Optional) The size of the subnetpool max prefix length.
trans-unit.target: max_prefixlen -（可选）子网池最大前缀长度的大小。

trans-unit.source: max_prefixlen - See Argument Reference above.

trans-unit.source: max_price - The maximum hourly price you're willing to pay for the Spot Instances.
trans-unit.target: max_price -您愿意为竞价型实例支付的最高每小时价格。

trans-unit.target: max_recurrence_interval -（可选）两次重复之间的最大间隔。

trans-unit.source: max_replicas - (Required) The group will never be larger than this.
trans-unit.target: max_replicas -（必需）组永远不会大于此。

trans-unit.source: max_replicas - (Required) Upper limit for the number of pods that can be set by the autoscaler.
trans-unit.target: max_replicas -（必需）自动缩放器可以设置的窗格数量上限。

trans-unit.source: max_retries – (Optional) The maximum number of times to retry this job if it fails.
trans-unit.target: max_retries –（可选）此作业失败时重试的最大次数。

trans-unit.source: max_retries - (Optional) The maximum number of retires before failing an API request. Default: 10 Can also be specified with the NSXT_MAX_RETRIES environment variable.
trans-unit.target: max_retries -（可选）在API请求失败之前最多可以退休的次数。默认值： 10 也可以使用 NSXT_MAX_RETRIES 环境变量指定。

trans-unit.source: max_retries - (Optional) The maximum number of tries to make for a successful response when operating on resources within Oracle Cloud Platform. It can also be sourced from the OPC_MAX_RETRIES environment variable. Defaults to 1.
trans-unit.target: max_retries -（可选）在Oracle Cloud Platform中的资源上进行操作时，为成功响应做出的最大尝试次数。也可以从 OPC_MAX_RETRIES 环境变量中获取。默认为1。

trans-unit.source: max_retries - (Optional) The maximum number of tries to make for a successful response when operating on resources. It can also be sourced from the OPC_MAX_RETRIES environment variable. Defaults to 1.
trans-unit.target: max_retries -（可选）对资源进行操作时，成功响应的最大尝试次数。也可以从 OPC_MAX_RETRIES 环境变量中获取。默认为1。

trans-unit.source: max_retries - (Optional) This is the maximum number of times an API call is retried, in the case where requests are being throttled or experiencing transient failures. The delay between the subsequent API calls increases exponentially.
trans-unit.target: max_retries -（可选）这是在请求被限制或遇到短暂故障的情况下重试API调用的最大次数。后续API调用之间的延迟成倍增加。

trans-unit.source: max_retries - (Required) Number of permissible ping failures before changing the member's status to INACTIVE. Must be a number between 1 and 10. Changing this updates the max_retries of the existing monitor.
trans-unit.target: max_retries -（必需）在将成员的状态更改为INACTIVE之前允许的ping失败次数。必须为1到10之间的数字。更改此值将更新现有监视器的max_retries。

trans-unit.source: max_retries - (Required) Number of permissible ping failures before changing the member's status to INACTIVE. Must be a number between 1 and 10..
trans-unit.target: max_retries -（必需）在将成员的状态更改为INACTIVE之前允许的ping失败次数。必须是1到10之间的数字。

trans-unit.source: max_retries - See Argument Reference above.
trans-unit.target: max_retries -请参见上面的参数参考。

trans-unit.source: max_retry_count - (Optional, int) The maximum amount of times to an attempt a restart when restart is set to "on-failure"
trans-unit.target: max_retry_count -（可选，整数）将重新启动时尝试重新 restart 的最大次数设置为“ on-failure”

trans-unit.source: max_retry_interval - The maximum interval between retries.
trans-unit.target: max_retry_interval -重试之间的最大间隔。

trans-unit.source: max_retry_timeout - (Optional) This provides you with the ability to specify the maximum amount of time (in seconds) you are prepared to wait for interactions on resources managed by vCloud Director to be successful. If a resource action fails, the action will be retried (as long as it is still within the max_retry_timeout value) to try and ensure success. Defaults to 60 seconds if not set. Can also be specified with the VCD_MAX_RETRY_TIMEOUT environment variable.
trans-unit.target: max_retry_timeout -（可选）这使您能够指定准备等待vCloud Director管理的资源成功进行交互的最长时间（以秒为单位）。如果资源操作失败，将重试该操作（只要它仍在 max_retry_timeout 值之内）以尝试确保成功。如果未设置，则默认为60秒。也可以使用 VCD_MAX_RETRY_TIMEOUT 环境变量指定。

trans-unit.source: max_session_duration - (Optional) The maximum session duration (in seconds) that you want to set for the specified role. If you do not specify a value for this setting, the default maximum of one hour is applied. This setting can have a value from 1 hour to 12 hours.
trans-unit.target: max_session_duration -（可选）要为指定角色设置的最大会话持续时间（以秒为单位）。如果您没有为此设置指定值，则默认为一小时。此设置的值可以在1小时到12小时之间。

trans-unit.source: max_size - (Optional) The maximum size for the Auto Scaling group. Default 0. Set to -1 if you don't want to change the maximum size at the scheduled time.
trans-unit.target: max_size -（可选）Auto Scaling组的最大大小。默认值0。如果您不想在计划的时间更改最大大小，则设置为-1。

trans-unit.source: max_size - (Optional; Required if using scaling policies) The maximum number of instances the group should have at any time.
trans-unit.target: max_size -（可选；如果使用扩展策略，则为必需）组应随时具有的最大实例数。

trans-unit.source: max_size - (Required) Maximum number of ECS instances in the scaling group. Value range: [0, 100].
trans-unit.target: max_size -（必填）伸缩组中ECS实例的最大数量。值范围：[0，100]。

trans-unit.source: max_size - (Required) The maximum size of the auto scale group.
trans-unit.target: max_size -（必需）自动缩放比例组的最大尺寸。

trans-unit.source: max_size - The maximum number of ECS instances.
trans-unit.target: max_size -ECS实例的最大数量。

trans-unit.source: max_size - The maximum size of the autoscale group
trans-unit.target: max_size -自动缩放组的最大大小

trans-unit.source: max_size_bytes - (Optional) The maximum size in bytes the database service should be allowed to expand to. Range depends on the database edition selected above.
trans-unit.target: max_size_bytes -（可选）应允许数据库服务扩展到的最大大小（以字节为单位）。范围取决于上面选择的数据库 edition 。

trans-unit.source: max_size_bytes - (Optional) The maximum size that the database can grow to. Applies only if create_mode is Default. Please see Azure SQL Database Service Tiers.
trans-unit.target: max_size_bytes -（可选）数据库可以增长到的最大大小。仅在 create_mode 为 Default 时适用。请参阅 Azure SQL数据库服务层。

trans-unit.source: max_size_in_megabytes - (Optional) Integer value which controls the size of memory allocated for the queue. For supported values see the "Queue/topic size" section of this document.
trans-unit.target: max_size_in_megabytes -（可选）整数值，该值控制为队列分配的内存大小。有关受支持的值，请参阅本文档的“队列/主题大小”部分。

trans-unit.source: max_size_in_megabytes - (Optional) Integer value which controls the size of memory allocated for the topic. For supported values see the "Queue/topic size" section of this document.
trans-unit.target: max_size_in_megabytes -（可选）整数值，该值控制为主题分配的内存大小。有关受支持的值，请参阅本文档的“队列/主题大小”部分。

trans-unit.source: max_stale_age - (Optional) How old an object is allowed to be to serve stale-if-error or stale-while-revalidate, in seconds.
trans-unit.target: max_stale_age -（可选）允许对象使用多长时间（ stale-if-error 或 stale-while-revalidate （以秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: max_staleness_prefix - (Optional) When used with the Bounded Staleness consistency level, this value represents the number of stale requests tolerated. Accepted range for this value is 10 – 2147483647. Defaults to 100. Required when consistency_level is set to BoundedStaleness.
trans-unit.target: max_staleness_prefix -（可选）与Bounded Staleness一致性级别一起使用时，此值表示可容忍的过时请求数。该值的可接受范围是 10 – 2147483647 。默认为 100 。当 consistency_level 设置为 BoundedStaleness 时是必需的。

trans-unit.source: max_staleness_prefix - The number of stale requests tolerated when the consistency level is Bounded Staleness.
trans-unit.target: max_staleness_prefix -当一致性级别为Bounded Staleness时，允许的过时请求数。

trans-unit.source: max_surge_fixed - (Optional), The maximum number of instances that can be created above the specified targetSize during the update process. Conflicts with max_surge_percent. If neither is set, defaults to 1
trans-unit.target: max_surge_fixed -（可选），在更新过程中可以在指定的targetSize以上创建的最大实例数。与 max_surge_percent 冲突。如果两者均未设置，则默认为1

trans-unit.source: max_surge_fixed - (Optional), The maximum number of instances that can be created above the specified targetSize during the update process. Conflicts with max_surge_percent. It has to be either 0 or at least equal to the number of zones. If fixed values are used, at least one of max_unavailable_fixed or max_surge_fixed must be greater than 0.
trans-unit.target: max_surge_fixed -（可选），在更新过程中可以在指定的targetSize以上创建的最大实例数。与 max_surge_percent 冲突。它必须为0或至少等于区域数。如果使用固定值，则 max_unavailable_fixed 或 max_surge_fixed 中至少之一必须大于0。

trans-unit.source: metric_aggregation_type - (Optional) The aggregation type for the policy's metrics. Valid values are "Minimum", "Maximum", and "Average". Without a value, AWS will treat the aggregation type as "Average".
trans-unit.target: metric_aggregation_type -（可选）策略指标的聚合类型。有效值为“最小”，“最大”和“平均”。如果没有值，AWS将把聚合类型视为“平均”。

trans-unit.source: metric_cluster - (Optional) A metric cluster to graph. See below for options.
trans-unit.target: metric_cluster -（可选）要绘制图表的度量标准集群。请参阅下面的选项。

trans-unit.source: metric_dimension - (Optional) The dimensions of the metric.
trans-unit.target: metric_dimension -（可选）指标的尺寸。

trans-unit.source: metric_groups - (Optional) List of names of metric groups to add this fleet to. A metric group tracks metrics across all fleets in the group. Defaults to default.
trans-unit.target: metric_groups -（可选）要添加该舰队的度量标准组的名称列表。度量标准组跟踪组中所有机队的度量标准。默认为 default 。

trans-unit.source: metric_id - The Identifier for Azure Insights metrics.
trans-unit.target: metric_id -Azure Insights指标的指标。

trans-unit.source: metric_interval_lower_bound - (Optional) The lower bound for the difference between the alarm threshold and the CloudWatch metric. Without a value, AWS will treat this bound as infinity.
trans-unit.target: metric_interval_lower_bound -（可选）警报阈值和CloudWatch指标之间的差异的下限。如果没有值，AWS将把此绑定视为无穷大。

trans-unit.source: metric_interval_lower_bound - (Optional) The lower bound for the difference between the alarm threshold and the CloudWatch metric. Without a value, AWS will treat this bound as negative infinity.
trans-unit.target: metric_interval_lower_bound -（可选）警报阈值和CloudWatch指标之间的差异的下限。如果没有值，AWS将将此绑定视为负无穷大。

trans-unit.source: metric_interval_upper_bound - (Optional) The upper bound for the difference between the alarm threshold and the CloudWatch metric. Without a value, AWS will treat this bound as infinity. The upper bound must be greater than the lower bound.
trans-unit.target: metric_interval_upper_bound -（可选）警报阈值和CloudWatch指标之间的差异的上限。如果没有值，AWS将把此绑定视为无穷大。上限必须大于下限。

trans-unit.source: metric_limit - (Optional) Setting a metric limit will tell the Circonus backend to periodically look at the check to see if there are additional metrics the collector has seen that we should collect. It will not reactivate metrics previously collected and then marked as inactive. Values are 0 to disable, -1 to enable all metrics or N+ to collect up to the value N (both -1 and N+ can not exceed other account restrictions).
trans-unit.target: metric_limit -（可选）设置度量标准限制将使Circonus后端定期查看检查，以查看收集者是否发现了我们应该收集的其他度量标准。它不会重新激活先前收集的然后被标记为无效的指标。值是 0 到禁用， -1 ，以使所有的指标或 N+ 收集多达值 N （包括 -1 和 N+ 不能超过其他帐户限制）。

trans-unit.source: metric_name - (Optional) The name of the metric stream within the check to graph.
trans-unit.target: metric_name -（可选）要检查的图表中的度量标准流的名称。

trans-unit.source: metric_name - (Required) A friendly name for the metrics from the rule group
trans-unit.target: metric_name -（必需）规则组中指标的友好名称

trans-unit.source: metric_name - (Required) Specifies the metric name. The value can be a string of 1 to 64 characters that must start with a letter and can consists of uppercase letters, lowercase letters, numbers, or underscores (_).
trans-unit.target: metric_name -（必需）指定度量标准名称。取值范围为1〜64个字符，必须以字母开头，并且可以由大写字母，小写字母，数字或下划线（_）组成。

trans-unit.source: metric_name - (Required) The CloudWatch metric name.
trans-unit.target: metric_name -（必需）CloudWatch指标名称。

trans-unit.source: metric_name - (Required) The metric that defines what the rule monitors.
trans-unit.target: metric_name -（必需）用于定义规则监视内容的度量。

trans-unit.target: metric_name -（必需）警报的关联指标的名称。有关支持的指标，请参阅文档。

trans-unit.source: metric_name - (Required) The name of the metric stream within a given check that this rule set is active on.
trans-unit.target: metric_name -（必需）在给定检查中该规则集处于活动状态的度量标准流的名称。

trans-unit.source: metric_name - (Required) The name of the metric, with or without spaces.
trans-unit.target: metric_name -（必需）度量标准的名称，带或不带空格。

trans-unit.target: metric_name -（必需）度量标准的名称。

trans-unit.source: metric_name- The name of the metric this alert condition applies to.

trans-unit.source: metric_namespace - (Required) The CloudWatch metric namespace name.
trans-unit.target: metric_namespace -（必需）CloudWatch指标名称空间名称。

trans-unit.source: metric_timestamp - (Optional) An optional Unix timestamp (http://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonCloudWatch/latest/DeveloperGuide/cloudwatch_concepts.html#about_timestamp).
trans-unit.target: metric_timestamp -（可选）可选的Unix时间戳（ http://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonCloudWatch/latest/DeveloperGuide/cloudwatch_concepts.html#about_timestamp）。

trans-unit.source: metric_transformation - (Required) A block defining collection of information needed to define how metric data gets emitted. See below.
trans-unit.target: metric_transformation -（必需）一个块，用于定义定义度量数据如何发出所需的信息集合。见下文。

trans-unit.source: metric_type - (Optional) The type of metric this rule set will operate on. Valid values are numeric (the default) and text.
trans-unit.target: metric_type -（可选）此规则集将使用的度量标准类型。有效值为 numeric （默认值）和 text 。

trans-unit.source: metric_type - (Required) The type of the metric. Valid values are: numeric, text, histogram, composite, or caql.
trans-unit.target: metric_type -（必需）度量标准的类型。有效值为： numeric ， text ， histogram ， composite 或 caql 。

trans-unit.source: metric_unit - (Required) The metric unit (supported units can be found here: http://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonCloudWatch/latest/DeveloperGuide/cloudwatch_concepts.html#Unit)
trans-unit.target: metric_unit -（必需）度量单位（可在此处找到支持的单位： http : //docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonCloudWatch/latest/DeveloperGuide/cloudwatch_concepts.html#Unit）

trans-unit.source: metric_value - (Required) The CloudWatch metric value.
trans-unit.target: metric_value -（必需）CloudWatch指标值。

trans-unit.source: metrics_enabled - (Optional) Specifies whether Amazon CloudWatch metrics are enabled for this method.
trans-unit.target: metrics_enabled -（可选）指定是否为此方法启用了Amazon CloudWatch指标。

trans-unit.source: metrics_granularity - (Optional) The granularity to associate with the metrics to collect. The only valid value is 1Minute. Default is 1Minute.
trans-unit.target: metrics_granularity -（可选）与要收集的度量标准关联的粒度。唯一的有效值为 1Minute 。默认值为 1Minute 。

trans-unit.source: mfa_bind_required - (Optional) This parameter indicates whether the MFA needs to be bind when the user first logs in. Default value is false.
trans-unit.target: mfa_bind_required -（可选）此参数指示用户首次登录时是否需要绑定MFA。默认值为 false 。

trans-unit.source: mfa_bind_required - The parameter which indicates whether the MFA needs to be bind when the user first logs in.
trans-unit.target: mfa_bind_required -该参数指示用户首次登录时是否需要绑定MFA。

trans-unit.source: mfa_configuration - (Optional, Default: OFF) Set to enable multi-factor authentication. Must be one of the following values (ON, OFF, OPTIONAL)
trans-unit.target: mfa_configuration -（可选，默认：OFF）设置为启用多因素身份验证。必须为以下值之一（ON，OFF，OPTIONAL）

trans-unit.source: mfa_delete - (Optional) Enable MFA delete for either Change the versioning state of your bucket or Permanently delete an object version. Default is false.
trans-unit.target: mfa_delete -（可选）启用MFA删除，以 Change the versioning state of your bucket 或 Permanently delete an object version 。默认值为 false 。

trans-unit.source: mgmt_classes - (Optional) For external configuration management.
trans-unit.target: mgmt_classes -（可选）用于外部配置管理。

trans-unit.target: mgmt_classes -（可选）用于外部配置管理的管理类。

trans-unit.target: mgmt_parameters -（可选）将传递给管理应用程序的参数（必须是有效的YAML词典）。

trans-unit.source: mgmt_parameters - (Optional) Parameters which will be handed to your management application. Must be a valid YAML dictionary.
trans-unit.target: mgmt_parameters -（可选）将交给您的管理应用程序的参数。必须是有效的YAML字典。

trans-unit.source: microsoft_peering_config - (Optional) A microsoft_peering_config block as defined below. Required when peering_type is set to MicrosoftPeering.
trans-unit.target: microsoft_peering_config -（可选）如下定义的 microsoft_peering_config 块。在需要时 peering_type 设置为 MicrosoftPeering 。

trans-unit.source: middleware_volume_size - (Optional) Size of the middleware home disk volume for the service (/u01/app/oracle/middleware). The value must be a multiple of GBs. You can specify this value in bytes or GBs. If specified in GBs, use the following format: nG, where n specifies the number of GBs. For example, you can express 10 GBs as bytes or GBs. For example: 100000000000 or 10G. This value defaults to the system configured volume size.
trans-unit.target: middleware_volume_size -（可选）服务（/ u01 / app / oracle / middleware）的中间件主磁盘卷的大小。该值必须是GB的倍数。您可以以字节或GB为单位指定此值。如果以GB为单位指定，请使用以下格式：nG，其中n指定GB的数量。例如，您可以将10 GB表示为字节或GB。例如：100000000000或10G。该值默认为系统配置的卷大小。

trans-unit.source: migrate_wait_timeout - (Optional) The amount of time, in minutes, to wait for a virtual machine migration to complete before failing. Default: 10 minutes. Also see the section on virtual machine migration.
trans-unit.target: migrate_wait_timeout -（可选）失败前等待虚拟机迁移完成的时间（分钟）。默认值：10分钟。另请参阅有关虚拟机迁移的部分。

trans-unit.source: migration_type - (Required) The migration type. Can be one of full-load | cdc | full-load-and-cdc.
trans-unit.target: migration_type -（必填）迁移类型。可以是 full-load | cdc | full-load-and-cdc 。

trans-unit.source: mime - (Required) MIME format of the content (default text/plain).
trans-unit.target: mime -（必需）内容的MIME格式（默认为 text / plain）。

trans-unit.source: min - (Optional) Min usage constraints on this kind by resource name.
trans-unit.target: min -（可选）按资源名称的最小使用限制。

trans-unit.source: min - (Optional) Minimum bound for the graph's yaxis, a string.
trans-unit.target: min -（可选）图形y轴的最小范围，一个字符串。

trans-unit.target: min -（可选）Y轴的理论最小值。

trans-unit.source: min(float1, float2, ...) - Returns the smallest of the floats.
trans-unit.target: min(float1, float2, ...) -返回最小的浮点数。

trans-unit.source: min_adjustment_magnitude - (Optional) The minimum number to adjust your scalable dimension as a result of a scaling activity. If the adjustment type is PercentChangeInCapacity, the scaling policy changes the scalable dimension of the scalable target by this amount.
trans-unit.target: min_adjustment_magnitude -（可选）由于伸缩活动而调整可伸缩尺寸的最小数字。如果调整类型为PercentChangeInCapacity，则缩放策略将按此数量更改可缩放目标的可缩放维度。

trans-unit.source: min_adjustment_step - (Optional) Use min_adjustment_magnitude instead.
trans-unit.target: min_adjustment_step -（可选）改用 min_adjustment_magnitude 。

trans-unit.source: min_backoff - (Optional) Minimum backoff period in seconds after failed API calls. Default: 1. This can also be specified with the CLOUDFLARE_MIN_BACKOFF shell environment variable.
trans-unit.target: min_backoff -（可选）失败的API调用后的最小退避时间（以秒为单位）。默认值：1。也可以使用 CLOUDFLARE_MIN_BACKOFF shell环境变量来指定。

trans-unit.source: min_capacity - (Optional) The minimum capacity.
trans-unit.target: min_capacity -（可选）最小容量。

trans-unit.source: min_capacity - (Optional; Only valid for statefulUpdateCapacity) The minimum number of instances the group should have.
trans-unit.target: min_capacity -（可选；仅对statefulUpdateCapacity有效）组应具有的最小实例数。

trans-unit.source: min_capacity - (Required) The min capacity of the scalable target.
trans-unit.target: min_capacity -（必需）可伸缩目标的最小容量。

trans-unit.source: min_child_endpoints - (Optional) This argument specifies the minimum number of endpoints that must be ‘online’ in the child profile in order for the parent profile to direct traffic to any of the endpoints in that child profile. This argument only applies to Endpoints of type nestedEndpoints and defaults to 1.
trans-unit.target: min_child_endpoints -（可选）此参数指定子配置文件中必须“联机”的最小端点数，以便父配置文件将流量定向到该子配置文件中的任何端点。此参数仅适用于 nestedEndpoints 类型的 Endpoints，默认值为 1 。

trans-unit.source: min_cpu_platform - (Optional) Minimum CPU platform to be used by this instance. The instance may be scheduled on the specified or newer CPU platform. Applicable values are the friendly names of CPU platforms, such as Intel Haswell. See the official documentation for more information.
trans-unit.target: min_cpu_platform -（可选）此实例要使用的最小CPU平台。可以在指定的或更新的CPU平台上调度实例。适用的值是CPU平台的友好名称，例如 Intel Haswell 。有关更多信息，请参见官方文档。

trans-unit.source: min_cpu_platform - (Optional) Specifies a minimum CPU platform for the VM instance. Applicable values are the friendly names of CPU platforms, such as Intel Haswell or Intel Skylake. See the complete list here. Note: allow_stopping_for_update must be set to true in order to update this field.
trans-unit.target: min_cpu_platform -（可选）为VM实例指定最低CPU平台。适用的值是CPU平台的友好名称，例如 Intel Haswell 或 Intel Skylake 。请在此处查看完整列表。注意：必须将 allow_stopping_for_update 设置为true才能更新此字段。

trans-unit.source: min_cpu_platform - (Optional) Specifies a minimum CPU platform. Applicable values are the friendly names of CPU platforms, such as Intel Haswell or Intel Skylake. See the complete list here.

trans-unit.source: min_elb_capacity - (Optional) Setting this causes Terraform to wait for this number of instances to show up healthy in the ELB only on creation. Updates will not wait on ELB instance number changes. (See also Waiting for Capacity below.)
trans-unit.target: min_elb_capacity -（可选）设置此选项将导致Terraform仅在创建时等待此数量的实例在ELB中正常显示。更新不会等待ELB实例号更改。（另请参见下面的等待容量。）

trans-unit.source: min_instance_number - (Optional) The minimum number of instances. The default value is 0.
trans-unit.target: min_instance_number -（可选）最小实例数。默认值为0。

trans-unit.target: min_instance_number -请参见上面的参数参考。

trans-unit.source: min_length (Optional) - The minimum length of an attribute value of the string type.
trans-unit.target: min_length （可选）-字符串类型的属性值的最小长度。

trans-unit.source: min_lower - (Optional) (default 0) Minimum number of lowercase alphabet characters in random string.
trans-unit.target: min_lower -（可选）（默认为0）随机字符串中最小小写字母字符的数量。

trans-unit.source: min_master_version - (Optional) The minimum version of the master. GKE will auto-update the master to new versions, so this does not guarantee the current master version--use the read-only master_version field to obtain that. If unset, the cluster's version will be set by GKE to the version of the most recent official release (which is not necessarily the latest version).
trans-unit.target: min_master_version -（可选）母版的最低版本。GKE会自动将主版本更新为新版本，因此这不能保证当前的主版本-使用只读的 master_version 字段来获取该版本。如果未设置，则群集的版本将由GKE设置为最新的正式版本（不一定是最新版本）。

trans-unit.source: min_node_count - (Required) Minimum number of nodes in the NodePool. Must be >=1 and <= max_node_count.
trans-unit.target: min_node_count -（必需） NodePool中的最小节点数。必须为> = 1和<= max_node_count 。

trans-unit.source: min_numeric - (Optional) (default 0) Minimum number of numeric characters in random string.
trans-unit.target: min_numeric -（可选）（默认为0）随机字符串中数字字符的最小数目。

trans-unit.source: min_prefixlen - (Optional) The size of the subnetpool min prefix length.
trans-unit.target: min_prefixlen -（可选）子网池的最小前缀长度。

trans-unit.source: min_prefixlen - (Optional) The smallest prefix that can be allocated from a subnetpool. For IPv4 subnetpools, default is 8. For IPv6 subnetpools, default is 64. Changing this updates the min prefixlen of the existing subnetpool.
trans-unit.target: min_prefixlen -（可选）可以从子网池分配的最小前缀。对于IPv4子网池，默认值为8。对于IPv6子网池，默认值为64。更改此选项将更新现有子网池的min prefixlen。

trans-unit.source: min_prefixlen - See Argument Reference above.
trans-unit.target: min_prefixlen -请参见上面的参数参考。

trans-unit.source: min_ram - (Optional) The minimum amount of RAM (in megabytes).

trans-unit.source: min_ready_sec - (Optional), Minimum number of seconds to wait for after a newly created instance becomes available. This value must be from range [0, 3600]
trans-unit.target: min_ready_sec -（可选），新创建的实例可用后要等待的最小秒数。此值必须在[0，3600]范围内

trans-unit.source: min_ready_seconds - (Optional) Minimum number of seconds for which a newly created pod should be ready without any of its container crashing, for it to be considered available. Defaults to 0 (pod will be considered available as soon as it is ready)
trans-unit.target: min_ready_seconds -（可选）新创建的容器应准备就绪的最小秒数，其容器不会崩溃，这才被视为可用。默认值为0（准备就绪后，便会认为Pod可用）

trans-unit.source: min_tls_version - The minimum supported TLS version of this policy.
trans-unit.target: min_tls_version -此策略支持的最低TLS版本。

trans-unit.source: min_ttl (Optional) - The minimum amount of time that you want objects to stay in CloudFront caches before CloudFront queries your origin to see whether the object has been updated. Defaults to 0 seconds.
trans-unit.target: min_ttl （可选）-在CloudFront查询源以查看对象是否已更新之前，您希望对象保留在CloudFront缓存中的最短时间。默认为0秒。

trans-unit.source: min_upper - (Optional) (default 0) Minimum number of uppercase alphabet characters in random string.
trans-unit.target: min_upper -（可选）（默认为0）随机字符串中大写字母字符的最小数目。

trans-unit.source: min_value (Optional) - The minimum value of an attribute that is of the number data type.
trans-unit.target: min_value （可选）-数字数据类型的属性的最小值。

trans-unit.source: min_value - (Optional) When the value is less than this value, this rule will fire (e.g. n < ${min_value}).
trans-unit.target: min_value -（可选）当值小于此值时，将触发此规则（例如 n < ${min_value} ）。

trans-unit.source: min_vcpus - (Required) The minimum number of EC2 vCPUs that an environment should maintain.
trans-unit.target: min_vcpus -（必需）环境应维护的EC2 vCPU的最小数量。

trans-unit.source: min_version - ??
trans-unit.target: min_version - ??

trans-unit.source: minimal_action - (Required) - Minimal action to be taken on an instance. Valid values are "RESTART", "REPLACE"
trans-unit.target: minimal_action -（必需）-对实例执行的最小操作。有效值为 "RESTART" ， "REPLACE"

trans-unit.source: minimum - (Optional; if using updateCapacity) The minimal number of instances to have in the group.
trans-unit.target: minimum - （可选;如果使用 updateCapacity ）实例的最小数目以具有在组中。

trans-unit.source: minimum_compression_size - (Optional) Minimum response size to compress for the REST API. Integer between -1 and 10485760 (10MB). Setting a value greater than -1 will enable compression, -1 disables compression (default).
trans-unit.target: minimum_compression_size -（可选）要为REST API压缩的最小响应大小。-1和10485760（10MB）之间的整数。设置大于-1的值将启用压缩，-1禁用压缩（默认）。

trans-unit.source: minimum_healthy_hosts - (Optional) A minimum_healthy_hosts block. Minimum Healthy Hosts are documented below.
trans-unit.target: minimum_healthy_hosts -（可选）minimum_healthy_hosts块。最低健康主机记录如下。

trans-unit.source: minimum_length (Optional) - The minimum length of the password policy that you have set.
trans-unit.target: minimum_length （可选）-您设置的密码策略的最小长度。

trans-unit.source: minimum_origins - (Optional) The minimum number of origins that must be healthy for this pool to serve traffic. If the number of healthy origins falls below this number, the pool will be marked unhealthy and we wil failover to the next available pool. Default: 1.
trans-unit.target: minimum_origins -（可选）此池必须能够正常运行的最小数量的起源，以服务于流量。如果健康来源的数量低于此数目，则该池将被标记为不健康，我们将故障转移到下一个可用池。默认值：1。

trans-unit.source: minimum_password_length - (Optional) Minimum length to require for user passwords.
trans-unit.target: minimum_password_length -（可选）用户密码所需的最小长度。

trans-unit.source: minimum_protocol_version - The minimum version of the SSL protocol that you want CloudFront to use for HTTPS connections. One of SSLv3, TLSv1, TLSv1_2016, TLSv1.1_2016 or TLSv1.2_2018. Default: TLSv1. NOTE: If you are using a custom certificate (specified with acm_certificate_arn or iam_certificate_id), and have specified sni-only in ssl_support_method, TLSv1 or later must be specified. If you have specified vip in ssl_support_method, only SSLv3 or TLSv1 can be specified. If you have specified cloudfront_default_certificate, TLSv1 must be specified.
trans-unit.target: minimum_protocol_version -您希望CloudFront用于HTTPS连接的SSL协议的最低版本。其中一个 SSLv3 ， TLSv1 ， TLSv1_2016 ， TLSv1.1_2016 或 TLSv1.2_2018 。默认值： TLSv1 。注：如果您使用的是自定义证书（与指定 acm_certificate_arn 或 iam_certificate_id ），并已指定 sni-only 在 ssl_support_method ， TLSv1 或更高版本必须指定。如果您在 ssl_support_method 中指定了 vip ，则仅 SSLv3 或可以指定 TLSv1 。如果指定了 cloudfront_default_certificate ，则必须指定 TLSv1 。

trans-unit.source: minion_config_file (string) - The path to your local minion config file. This will be uploaded to the /etc/salt on the remote. This option overrides the remote_state_tree or remote_pillar_roots options.
trans-unit.target: minion_config_file （字符串）-本地 minion配置文件的路径。这将被上传到远程服务器上的 /etc/salt 中。此选项将覆盖 remote_state_tree 或 remote_pillar_roots 选项。

trans-unit.target: mobile -（可选）RAM用户的电话号码。该号码必须包含国际区号前缀，如下所示：86-18600008888。

trans-unit.source: mode - (Optional) Either "READ_ONLY" or "READ_WRITE", defaults to "READ_WRITE" If you have a persistent disk with data that you want to share between multiple instances, detach it from any read-write instances and attach it to one or more instances in read-only mode.
trans-unit.target: mode -（可选）“ READ_ONLY”或“ READ_WRITE”，默认为“ READ_WRITE”。如果您有一个永久性磁盘，其中包含要在多个实例之间共享的数据，请将其与任何读写实例分离，并将其附加到一个实例上。以只读模式运行更多实例。

trans-unit.source: mode - (Optional) Mode of the domain. Valid values are DEVELOPMENT or PRODUCTION. Default value is PRODUCTION.
trans-unit.target: mode -（可选）域的模式。有效值为 DEVELOPMENT 或 PRODUCTION 。默认值为 PRODUCTION 。

trans-unit.source: mode - (Optional) Optional: mode bits to use on this file, must be a value between 0 and 0777. If not specified, the volume defaultMode will be used. This might be in conflict with other options that affect the file mode, like fsGroup, and the result can be other mode bits set.
trans-unit.target: mode - （可选）可选：模式位为使用该文件，必须在0777介于0和如果未指定，则体积defaultMode将被使用的值。这可能与影响文件模式的其他选项（例如fsGroup）冲突，并且结果可能是设置了其他模式位。

trans-unit.source: mode - (Optional) The directory's permission mode. Note that the mode must be properly specified as a decimal value (i.e. 0755 -> 493).
trans-unit.target: mode -（可选）目录的许可模式。请注意，必须将模式正确指定为十进制值（即0755-> 493）。

trans-unit.source: mode - (Optional) The file's permission mode. The mode must be properly specified as a decimal value (i.e. 0644 -> 420).
trans-unit.target: mode -（可选）文件的许可模式。该模式必须正确指定为十进制值（即0644-> 420）。

trans-unit.source: mode - (Optional) The mode in which to attach this disk, either READ_WRITE or READ_ONLY. If you are attaching or creating a boot disk, this must read-write mode.
trans-unit.target: mode -（可选）连接此磁盘的模式，即READ_WRITE或READ_ONLY。如果要附加或创建启动盘，则必须为读写模式。

trans-unit.source: mode - (Optional, block) See Mode below for details.
trans-unit.target: mode -（可选，阻止）有关详细信息，请参见下面的模式。

trans-unit.source: mode - (Required) Can be either PassThrough or Active. If PassThrough, Lambda will only trace the request from an upstream service if it contains a tracing header with "sampled=1". If Active, Lambda will respect any tracing header it receives from an upstream service. If no tracing header is received, Lambda will call X-Ray for a tracing decision.
trans-unit.target: mode -（必需）可以为 PassThrough 或 Active 。如果设置为PassThrough，则Lambda仅在上游服务包含包含“ sampled = 1”的跟踪标头时才跟踪来自上游服务的请求。如果为Active，则Lambda将尊重其从上游服务接收到的任何跟踪标头。如果未收到跟踪头，则Lambda将调用X-Ray进行跟踪决策。

trans-unit.source: mode - (Required) The interface mode. This can be any of the following values: layer3, layer2, virtual-wire, tap, ha, decrypt-mirror, or aggregate-group.
trans-unit.target: mode -（必需）接口模式。它可以是以下任何值： layer3 ， layer2 ， virtual-wire ， tap ， ha ， decrypt-mirror 或 aggregate-group 。

trans-unit.source: mode - (Required) The policy mode that allows you to specify which resource types will be evaluated. The value can be "All", "Indexed" or "NotSpecified". Changing this resource forces a new resource to be created.
trans-unit.target: mode -（必需）策略模式，允许您指定要评估的资源类型。该值可以是“全部”，“索引”或“未指定”。更改此资源将强制创建新资源。

trans-unit.source: mode - (Required) The type of action to perform. Allowable values are 'simulate' and 'ban'.
trans-unit.target: mode -（必需）要执行的操作类型。允许的值为“模拟”和“禁止”。

trans-unit.target: mode -（必需）区域的模式。这可以是 layer3 ， layer2 ， virtual-wire ， tap 或 tunnel 。

trans-unit.target: mode - （可选）模式位为使用该文件，必须在0777介于0和如果未指定，则体积defaultMode将被使用的值。

trans-unit.source: -module=module_name - The module path which has needed output. By default this is the root path. Other modules can be specified by a period-separated list. Example: "foo" would reference the module "foo" but "foo.bar" would reference the "bar" module in the "foo" module.
trans-unit.target: -module=module_name -需要输出的模块路径。默认情况下，这是根路径。其他模块可以用句点分隔列表指定。示例：“ foo”将引用模块“ foo”，但“ foo.bar”将引用“ foo”模块中的“ bar”模块。

trans-unit.source: -module=path - The module path where the resource to taint exists. By default this is the root path. Other modules can be specified by a period-separated list. Example: "foo" would reference the module "foo" but "foo.bar" would reference the "bar" module in the "foo" module.
trans-unit.target: -module=path -要污染的资源所在的模块路径。默认情况下，这是根路径。其他模块可以用句点分隔列表指定。示例：“ foo”将引用模块“ foo”，但“ foo.bar”将引用“ foo”模块中的“ bar”模块。

trans-unit.source: -module=path - The module path where the resource to untaint exists. By default this is the root path. Other modules can be specified by a period-separated list. Example: "foo" would reference the module "foo" but "foo.bar" would reference the "bar" module in the "foo" module.

Available settings are auth_type (default: PASSWORD), auth_mechanism (default: DEFAULT), nesting_level (default: NONE), extract_doc_id (default: false), docs_to_investigate (default: 1000) and auth_source (default: admin). For more details, see Using MongoDB as a Source for AWS DMS.

trans-unit.source: most_recent - (Optional) If more than one result is returned, use the most recent snapshot.
trans-unit.target: most_recent -（可选）如果返回多个结果，请使用最新快照。

trans-unit.source: most_recent - (Optional) If more than one result is returned, use the most recent solution stack.

trans-unit.source: most_recent - (Optional) If set to true, it sorts the certificates matched by previous criteria by the NotBefore field, returning only the most recent one. If set to false, it returns an error if more than one certificate is found. Defaults to false.
trans-unit.target: most_recent -（可选）如果设置为true，它将按NotBefore字段对与先前条件匹配的证书进行排序，仅返回最新的证书。如果设置为false，则如果找到多个证书，则返回错误。默认为false。

trans-unit.source: most_recent - (Optional) The most recent collector installed that is online
trans-unit.target: most_recent -（可选）最新安装的在线收集器

trans-unit.source: most_recent - (bool) If more than one result is returned, use the most recent Image.
trans-unit.target: most_recent -（布尔型）如果返回多个结果，请使用最新的Image。

trans-unit.source: mount - (Optional) Contains the set of mount and formatting options for the filesystem. A non-null entry indicates that the filesystem should be mounted before it is used by Ignition.
trans-unit.target: mount -（可选）包含文件系统的一组安装和格式化选项。非空条目表示在Ignition使用文件系统之前，应先挂载该文件系统。

trans-unit.source: mount_path - (Required) Path within the container at which the volume should be mounted. Must not contain ':'.
trans-unit.target: mount_path -（必需）应在其中安装卷的容器内的路径。不得包含“：”。

trans-unit.source: mount_path - (Required) The path on which this volume is to be mounted. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.
trans-unit.target: mount_path -（必需）要在其上安装该卷的路径。更改此选项将强制创建新资源。

trans-unit.target: mount_point -（必填）将EBS卷挂载到图层实例上的路径。

trans-unit.source: mount_point_base - A mount point base name for shared storage.

trans-unit.source: mount_target_id - (Required) ID of the mount target that you want to have described
trans-unit.target: mount_target_id -（必需）您要描述的安装目标的ID

trans-unit.source: mountpoint (string) - The mountpoint of the volume.

trans-unit.target: mqtt_enabled_state -（必填）该字段允许 MQTT_ENABLED 或 MQTT_DISABLED 。

trans-unit.source: msi_endpoint - (Optional) The REST endpoint to retrieve an MSI token from. Terraform will attempt to discover this automatically but it can be specified manually here. It can also be sourced from the ARM_MSI_ENDPOINT environment variable.
trans-unit.target: msi_endpoint -（可选）从中检索MSI令牌的REST端点。Terraform将尝试自动发现它，但是可以在此处手动指定。它也可以从 ARM_MSI_ENDPOINT 环境变量获取。

trans-unit.target: mssql -（可选）包含用于MSSQL连接的配置选项的嵌套块。

trans-unit.source: mtu - (Optional) The MTU.
trans-unit.target: mtu -（可选）MTU。

trans-unit.target: mtu -（可选）虚拟交换机的最大传输单位（MTU）。默认值： 1500 。

trans-unit.source: mtu - (Optional) The maximum transmission unit (MTU) value to address fragmentation. Minimum value is 68 for IPv4, and 1280 for IPv6.

trans-unit.source: mtu - See Argument Reference above.

trans-unit.target: multi -（可选）是否检索多个可用性。默认为 false 。通常使用多个区域来启动RDS。

trans-unit.target: multi_az -（可选）指定RDS实例是否为多可用区

trans-unit.source: multi_az - If the RDS instance is multi AZ enabled.
trans-unit.target: multi_az -如果RDS实例启用了多可用区。

trans-unit.target: multi_factor_auth_enabled -（可选）是否启用多因素身份验证。有效值为 true 和 false 。

trans-unit.source: multi_factor_auth_rule - (Optional) A multi-factor authentication rule. The structure is documented below. Please see the Ocata release notes for more information on how to use mulit-factor rules.

trans-unit.source: multi_value_delimiter: (Optional) Delimiter used to join together multiple values into a single string when allow_multiple_values is set and the user chooses multiple values.
trans-unit.target: multi_value_delimiter ：（可选）当设置 allow_multiple_values 且用户选择多个值时，用于将多个值连接在一起成为单个字符串的定界符。

trans-unit.source: multicast_filtering_mode - (Optional) The multicast filtering mode to use with the switch. Can be one of legacyFiltering or snooping.

trans-unit.target: multiple_host_access -如果为 true ，则已配置数据中心中的多个主机有权访问数据存储。

trans-unit.source: multivalue_answer_routing_policy - (Optional) Set to true to indicate a multivalue answer routing policy. Conflicts with any other routing policy.
trans-unit.target: multivalue_answer_routing_policy -（可选）设置为 true 表示多值答案路由策略。与任何其他路由策略冲突。

trans-unit.source: name - (Optional) The name of the LB. This name must be unique within your AWS account, can have a maximum of 32 characters, must contain only alphanumeric characters or hyphens, and must not begin or end with a hyphen. If not specified, Terraform will autogenerate a name beginning with tf-lb.
trans-unit.target: name - （可选）LB的名字 此名称在您的AWS账户内必须唯一，最多可以包含32个字符，只能包含字母数字字符或连字符，并且不能以连字符开头或结尾。如果未指定，Terraform将自动生成以 tf-lb 开头的名称。

trans-unit.source: name - (Optional) The name of the Lightsail Key Pair. If omitted, a unique name will be generated by Terraform
trans-unit.target: name - （可选）Lightsail密钥对的名称。如果省略，则Terraform将生成一个唯一的名称

trans-unit.source: name - (Optional) The name of the SLB. This name must be unique within your AliCloud account, can have a maximum of 80 characters, must contain only alphanumeric characters or hyphens, such as "-","/",".","_", and must not begin or end with a hyphen. If not specified, Terraform will autogenerate a name beginning with tf-lb.
trans-unit.target: name -（可选）SLB的名称。该名称在您的AliCloud帐户中必须唯一，最多可以包含80个字符，只能包含字母数字字符或连字符，例如“-”，“ /”，“。”，“ _”，并且不得以开头或结尾带连字符。如果未指定，Terraform将自动生成以 tf-lb 开头的名称。

trans-unit.source: name - (Optional) The name of the VPC. Defaults to null.

trans-unit.target: name -（可选）自动缩放组的名称。默认情况下由Terraform生成。

trans-unit.source: name - (Optional) The name of the check that will be displayed in the web interface.
trans-unit.target: name -（可选）将在Web界面中显示的支票的名称。

trans-unit.source: name - (Optional) The name of the connection. Changing this updates the name of the existing connection.
trans-unit.target: name -（可选）连接的名称。更改此设置将更新现有连接的名称。

trans-unit.source: name - (Optional) The name of the container image that will run this particular build step. If the image is available in the host's Docker daemon's cache, it will be run directly. If not, the host will attempt to pull the image first, using the builder service account's credentials if necessary. The Docker daemon's cache will already have the latest versions of all of the officially supported build steps (https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/cloud-builders). The Docker daemon will also have cached many of the layers for some popular images, like "ubuntu", "debian", but they will be refreshed at the time you attempt to use them. If you built an image in a previous build step, it will be stored in the host's Docker daemon's cache and is available to use as the name for a later build step.
trans-unit.target: name -（可选）将运行此特定构建步骤的容器映像的名称。如果映像在主机的Docker守护程序的缓存中可用，它将直接运行。如果不是，主机将尝试首先使用构建器服务帐户的凭据来拉动映像。 Docker守护程序的缓存将已经具有所有官方支持的构建步骤的最新版本（ https://github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/cloud-builders）。 Docker守护程序还将为某些流行的映像（例如“ ubuntu”，“ debian”）缓存许多层，但是在您尝试使用它们时会刷新它们。如果您在上一个构建步骤中构建了映像，则它将存储在主机的Docker守护程序中。

trans-unit.source: name - (Optional) The name of the database to create when the DB instance is created. If this parameter is not specified, no database is created in the DB instance. Note that this does not apply for Oracle or SQL Server engines. See the AWS documentation for more details on what applies for those engines.
trans-unit.target: name -（可选）创建数据库实例时要创建的数据库的名称。如果未指定此参数，则不会在数据库实例中创建数据库。请注意，这不适用于Oracle或SQL Server引擎。有关适用于这些引擎的内容的更多详细信息，请参阅 AWS文档。

trans-unit.source: name - (Required) Name of the resource. Provided by the client when the resource is created. The name must be 1-63 characters long, and comply with RFC1035. Specifically, the name must be 1-63 characters long and match the regular expression [a-z]([-a-z0-9]*[a-z0-9])? which means the first character must be a lowercase letter, and all following characters must be a dash, lowercase letter, or digit, except the last character, which cannot be a dash.
trans-unit.target: name -（必填）资源名称。由客户端在创建资源时提供。名称必须为1-63个字符长，并符合RFC1035。具体来说，名称必须为1-63个字符长，并且与正则表达式 [a-z]([-a-z0-9]*[a-z0-9])? 匹配？这意味着第一个字符必须是小写字母，所有后续字符必须是破折号，小写字母或数字，最后一个字符除外（不能为破折号）。
